This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sir or Madam: 
 
  
 
Our firm represents Microsoft Corporation in certain legal matters. It
has come to our attention that a website hosted on your servers,
www.messengerfx.com <http://www.messengerfx.com/> , is using Microsoft's
MSN trademark and Butterfly logo on its site, which confuses and
misleads computer users as to an affiliation with or sponsorship by
Microsoft. Microsoft has not authorized the owner of this website to use
its trademarks in any fashion; in fact, the owner of the website is
veiled behind a private registration through the registrar Melbourne IT.

 
 
  
 
I am writing to you today to report this egregious misuse of Microsoft's
trademarks as a violation of your Acceptable Use Policy and ask you to
assist us by reviewing the situation and considering removal of the
website from your servers. If you view the website, you will see that
this is most likely a case in which the owner of the site is phishing
for personal information - including consumers' MSN login names and
passwords - by fraudulent use of Microsoft's registered trademarks.  If
you need to see Microsoft's trademark registrations for the MSN
trademark and/or the Butterfly logo to evaluate the situation, I can
provide you with copies.  
 
  
 
We believe the site to be hosted by your company based on the
information: 
 
 
Network Whois record 
 
 
Queried whois.arin.net with "66.98.248.43"...
